name: Half Shell Heroes: Blast to the Past Quiz / Test  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which turtle was driving the party wagon in the opening scene?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	While Don is widely known to have build all the cool gadgets and the like in the wagon, it was Leo who was driving it. They were looking for Tiger Claw and his evil compatriots.

questions.text: What building was being broken into when the turtles caught up with Tiger Claw?
options: Two Men and an Over Pizzeria
questions.explanation:
New York History Museum.

	The villains were trying to steal a piece from the museum when the turtles caught up with them. The four turtles dispatched the three villains, but didn't manage to stop the robbery.

questions.text: Which two bad guys were with Tiger Claw during the robbery?
questions.explanation:
Bebop and Rocksteady.

	Bebop and Rocksteady, both named after types of music, were acting as his minions. In the 1987 series Bebop and Rocksteady were the two main assistants to the Shredder, but they didn't appear at all in the 2003 series and in the 2012 series they are among several rotating sidekicks used in the series. For this episode they were used as assistants for Tiger Claw.

questions.text: While in the museum which turtle knocked over a T-Rex skeleton?
questions.explanation:
Mikey.

	While trying to stay quiet Mickey bumped into the skeleton. It teetered for a moment and then came crashing down. Oops! Mikey is almost always portrayed as the goofball and the most clumsy of the four turtles.

questions.text: The turtles kept a pet in their lair - what was its name?
questions.explanation:
Ice Cream Kitty.

	The cat was mutated to be made out of ice cream. In the 2012 series the cat was voiced by "TMNT" creator Kevin Eastman. For this episode the cat had no vocal lines, and was only featured in one scene.

questions.text: How many forms did the robotic transforming turtle have?
questions.explanation:
3.

	The three forms were the robot, a flight form that looked like a shuttle and a ground form designed to look like a tank. All three forms were used in multiple scenes in the episode.

questions.text: How far into the past were the turtles sent?
questions.explanation:
100 million years.

	The turtles, along with the three baddies they were fighting, were sent back to the time of the dinosaurs. Once in the past the turtles each met up with a dinosaur. Each dino they befriended was chosen to match up with a series of toys released in the early 1990s. How's that for nostalgia for the long time fans?

questions.text: When being chased by the T-Rex, where did the turtles hide?
questions.explanation:
Behind a log.

	The turtles were being chased through the jungle by the T-Rex when suddenly a large log was in the way. They all managed to fit behind it and hid until the dinosaur ran off to search for food elsewhere.

questions.text: The Turtlebot 5000 wouldn't have been complete without a matching headband. What color did it wear?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	Each of the four turtles wore a specific color. Donatello wore purple, Leonardo wore blue, Michelangelo wore orange and Raphael wore red. The Turtlebot 500 had a yellow mask, making it look similar to Metalhead from the 1987 cartoon series.

questions.text: Which alien race did the turtles find in the past?
questions.explanation:
Triceratons.

	The Triceratons had also found a way to travel to the past and were harvesting the planet millions of years before the human race would evolve. They looked like triceratop dinosaurs, but walked on their hind legs and could speak. In order to harvest the resources, they were enslaving dinosaurs to do the work.
